text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kaala Bhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Pannisai, Adi Streets, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Discourse on ‘Swami Vivekananda’ by Swami Guruvarananda, 5.45 p.m.; aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Discourse on ‘Lalithasahasranamam’ and spiritual heritage class by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 10 a.m.; on ‘Mundakopanishad,’ 7 a.m.; ‘Bhaja Govindanm,’ Vasudhara, Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Discourse on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life Divine’ by Subramany, Nithyatha, Auro Lab, Veerapanjan, 10 a.m.

Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Antaryogam, Swami Tatwananda Ashram, P and T Nagar, 9.30 a.m.

Melmaruvattur Adiparasakthi Aanmeega Iyakkam: Perumangala vizha; C. K. Gokulnath Premchand hoists flag, 8.30 a.m.; G. Kalidas lights lamp, Sellur K. Raju, Minister for Cooperation, addresses, Gita Natanagopalanayaki Mandir, Teppakulam, 10.35 p.m.

Sunday Vespers Service: C. Vijayakumar preaches, S. Wellington leads, Jubilee Chapel, American College, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service; Deva Manickam delivers message, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: G. Velan delivers K. Palaniappan memorial lecture on ‘Tirukkuralil porulatharam;’ R. Pandurangan presides, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6.30 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Fre rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Universal Peace Sanctuary: Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda conducts free meditation class, 138 Kamarajar Road, 7 p.m.

Swami Vivenakanda Vidya Mandir CBSE School: Inter-school ‘Surya Namaskar’ event, Harveypatti, 8 a.m.

Vaa Nanbaa: Tree planting in memory of solders killed in Siachen avalanche, Karamath Nagar First Street, Ellis Nagar, 7 a.m.

GENERAL

Thiagarajar College: S.R. Krishna Das, Chief Medical Officer, Aravind Eye Hospital, inaugurates free eye check up camp; K. Thiagarajan, secretary, presides, Konthagai, 8 a.m.

Madurai Institute of Social Sciences: Training programme in handling children affected by drug abuse; R. Giriraj, Deputy Director, National Institute of Social Defence, delivers valedictory address; D. V. P. Raja, founder, presides, Alagarkoil Road, 2.30 p.m.

One Billion Rising Madurai Forum: Global campaign against violence on women and girls; rally, Tamil Annai Statue, 2 p.m.; meeting, Gandhi Museum, 2.45 p.m.

Madurai Productivity Council: Productivity Week celebration; honouring past presidents; Manickam Rajasekaran, past Rotary District Governor, and L. Murari, president, Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association, address, TB Road, Mahaboobpalayam, 6.30 p.m.

Lions Clubs International: Inauguration of Region E conference by District Governor S. Ramasubbu; C. Gopinath and P. Reghuvaran, multiple council chairman, address, Fatima Michael College of Engineering and Technology, Sivaganga Road, 9.30 a.m.

Centre for Research and Rehabilitation of Infants and Females: HIV/AIDS awareness and treatment camp, Pothigai Street, Ganapathy Nagar, New Vilangudi, 10 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting; UC Higher Secondary School, 11 a.m.; RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, Lake View Road, K. K. Nagar, and Railway Institute, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
